title: Mac Studio + VSCode で [ の絡むショートカットが到達しない問題

lines.text: Mac Studio + VSCode で [ の絡むショートカットが到達しない問題
Mac Studio + VSCode で [ の絡むショートカットが到達しない問題
>I've had same problem with macOS Big Sur and Monterey. Not only VSCode but Electron apps didn't receive "cmd [" combination.
> I fixed this with 3 times of Macintosh HD format and 3 times of macOS reinstallation. (Even if no other apps or extensions is in my Mac, I encountered this issue 2 times).
> I don't know the reason why I could fix this but I can suggest the following steps.
> Update the macOS to latest version.
> reinstall macOS. (macOS reinstallation don't erase your data. Format Macintosh HD if you want to erase yours.)
よくよく見てみたらOSのバージョンが 12.3 だったので 12.4 にあげてみたら解消した、助かった
